message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I know it's a valuable piece, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $11,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $8,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach a deal.
I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
